text:
[smallbatch-frontend/] 6 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/b7801e1c9934321ba5cc95b3fc2c006dbac964c5|b7801e1c9934>: Comment out livereload code.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/ca62dadac04475c981d7a6837a949c1f7c41db8d|ca62dadac044>: Add hover state to desktop nav.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/72b50cc99945b4d3e667df38aa4cc66fc2194df1|72b50cc99945>: Style desktop nav active state.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/26878916aafb59089203d23cc1f2efe364ed6522|26878916aafb>: Add count animation to desktop home
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/76846bb1851244ad5a1486c5583359bfcfe01f48|76846bb18512>: Add count animation to desktop beers.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/0751d3732c8fb6b6c9033db77941f34fa7e171f9|0751d3732c8f>: Add count animation to mobile beers.
 - Gaston Figueroa
<@U026AP8CM> the new beer asset from the client is almost unusable.
the rectangle?
Yes. The one we had before was 19 lines of code. The new one has so much grit and imperfections it's almost 2500 lines of code.
holy shit.
okay i can send them a note.
So we are again in the situation where we can ask them (and provide an awkward explanation) to re cut them again or I can do it myself in less than 5 minutes.
With the caveat that it won't have the same level of grit.
i can send a quick note letting them know this.
is there another way to say the part about code?
is it just a huge file??

What we can tell them is that we coded the animations using the previous illustration. With this new illustration we aren't just making the entire home page load more slowly but we may also need to figure some things out again for the animation portion.
It's hard to explain because their asset generates code and we're using the code generated not the actual asset for this.
just sent a note i'll let you know what he says.
no problem.
Ok, thanks.
i asked for a decision today if possible and let him know our recommendation is to have uncorked create, though ours will be perfect rectangles without their grit, etc. keep you all posted.

[smallbatch-frontend/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/82639387818a042dcc6de6c380646f337e6d14a5|82639387818a>: Fix desktop home beer overflow and abv circles are now on the same baseline.
 - Gaston Figueroa
<@U02613K0X> / <@U026AP8CM> Looks like the beer animations aren't showing up on IE
IE 10 and 11
ok
good to know
thanks for the update.
i can have a look later this afternoon or in the morning and see if there's something that can be adjusted for IE compatibility

[smallbatch-frontend/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/d2dca72515e2f1faea6dc9fb031e37c94b78fb7b|d2dca72515e2>: Fix desktop home IE specific svg errors.
 - Gaston Figueroa
Thanks. I just fixed a couple of validation errors but that didn't fix the display of the beers.
to my knowledge i'm not doing anything that can't be supported on 10 & 11 but i will take a close look

[smallbatch-frontend/] 9 new commits:
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/ac2c6e48488933340932ce2986f60a5bb2a8dff6|ac2c6e484889>: Add ioBridge logo.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/338b5dad10e11de8df2746c39faf2a5005a2d469|338b5dad10e1>: Fix z-index on desktop beers.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/53848a897271486528e584e9a2e35295c0482dd7|53848a897271>: Change rollover effect on desktop home beers.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/b3e903803a9b291649c337ff42394dd998b0493d|b3e903803a9b>: Fix alcohol type weight on desktop cocktails.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/205d9c79d8601b27c054e76aacf5cdbfd6b5fef7|205d9c79d860>: Match menu to content on desktop eats.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/99b8112d25c0662d92cd31dedfdaff8f5ecea17b|99b8112d25c0>: Fix type weight on desktop eats.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/c5594e7760f6679014f83115f4389c552b47f055|c5594e7760f6>: Center line below eats menu on desktop.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/437df72630417cb8696ba0ccae00e8e247f82d8d|437df7263041>: Fix desktop eats menu highlight.
 - Gaston Figueroa
[smallbatch-frontend/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/smallbatch-frontend/commits/1257d082fb90af02ebcbd30e525f20cdc9aad7da|1257d082fb90>: Updated desktop social icons.
 - Gaston Figueroa
And... all actionable bugs have been smushed.
boom
<http://giphy.com/gifs/dnCvMV3fKB23C>
<@U026AP8CM> You almost killed me with this one.

<@U02618EV1> <@U026AP8CM> so css3 transforms work in IE except when applied to elements inside svgs:  path, g, etc. But they _will_ work on the svg element itself, so i'm confident i can rig something up for IE that achieves the same effect that we have in other browsers.
awesome! keep me posted. this sounds good though.
Ugh. Sorry I missed that.
you get a firework too. <http://giphy.com/gifs/dnCvMV3fKB23C>
ha
yeah i missed it too. i checked on css3 transform and keyframe animation support in general, but not specific to svg elements
:neutral_face:
I guess you could use good ol' top, left CSS properties only in IE. Not ideal but it would be a good fallback.
